attributes.review: I’m not part of trying to ban the app I didn’t even know it existed until just now looking at reviews but this app is genuinely awful and so is trump

attributes.review: Horrible app, extremely slow, is always crashing. No one should download this app
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: awww, poor baby orange man is mad that a bunch of teens and the rest of gen z ruined his little rally. deleting tiktok will only make it worse mr “president”. 👁👄👁 like what are you achieving doing this? also that’s immature and you should know the consequences. we’re gonna take you down trump. whether you like it or not. fbi can come to my door but it won’t do anything. 💅💅
attributes.title: baby orange man is mad

attributes.review: i got this app to keep updated with the incompetent president trump but all this app does is crash my phone. use the toxic wasteland of an app twitter instead.

attributes.review: Each time I opened the app it crashed and I also keep getting unsolicited texts from Trump 2020 that I can’t stop 😞

attributes.review: The interface is not good and as an avid Trump supporter, I expected more. Please do NOT download! The app kept shutting down every 2 minutes.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: One time my uncle downloaded this app, right now I’m at his funeral because when he first got on this app, he died. Just a flat line. This is a bad app. I give it a no no.
attributes.title: ✨no✨
